text: My two sons have been attending the lessons for about a half year. They started as a beginner, now can play well and most importantly, they love playing the piano and always waiting for the lesson. Michael is patient with kids and friendly. Recommended.

My kid is doing very well after few classes only,very good teacher for new joiners and beginners.
Highly recommend  his classes for beginners.
Good teacher. My child was able to quickly play songs after 1-2 lessons.
